description:
Everett says he has brown hair, but he's got a little of the ginger going on too!
He has an amazing, toned body with just the right amount of hair. Plus, he has an adorable face and smile.
He's 24 and has a degree in business administration, but right now he's working in a restaurant.
"It pays the bills," he said. "Plus, it's a good way to meet girls."
"Do you have any fetishes?"
"Girls with skirts on," he replied.
"Seeing them in skirts or fucking them in skirts?"
"Both. It's a weakness... skirts are a weakness!"
title: Everett
